subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Federer is aiming for an eighth title at Wimbledon, his favorite tournament, and if he gets it, at 33 he will be the oldest men’s champion of the Open era.
snippet: Federer is aiming for an eighth title at Wimbledon, his favorite tournament, and if he gets it, at 33 he will be the oldest men’s champion of the Open era.
